alert.note: Alert for Northeast Aroostook; Northwest Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 04 at 12:21AM EST until January 04 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility less than one quarter mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Northwest Aroostook and Northeast Aroostook Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and icy roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures are below freezing. The fog will freeze on contact creating dangerously icy conditions on area roads and other untreated surfaces.
info.instruction: A Dense Fog Advisory means visibilities will frequently be reduced to less than one quarter mile. If driving...slow down...use your low beam headlights...and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
